read packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
install.packages('SpadeR')
library(SpadeR)
```

read data
```{r}
ITS2 <- read_csv("../outputs/no_millet_vouchers_ITS2.csv")

trnL <- read_csv("../outputs/no_millet_vouchers_trnL.csv")
```

10 cutoff 
```{r}
#automatically removes NA's
under_10_reads_ITS2 <- ITS2 %>% 
  filter(Reads >= 10) %>% 
  select(SampleID, Reads, Species)

under_10_reads_trnL <- trnL %>% 
  filter(Reads >= 10) %>% 
  select(SampleID, Reads, Species)

```
